verses.verse: When <WG1161> he <WG846> was come down <WG2597> from <WG575> the mountain <WG3735>, great <WG4183> multitudes <WG3793> followed <WG190> him <WG846>.

And <WG2532>, behold <WG2400>, there came <WG2064> a leper <WG3015> and worshiped <WG4352> him <WG846>, saying <WG3004>, Lord <WG2962>, if <WG1437> you will <WG2309>, you can <WG1410> make <WG2511> me <WG3165> clean <WG2511>.

And <WG2532> Jesus <WG2424> put forth <WG1614> his hand <WG5495>, and touched <WG680> him <WG846>, saying <WG3004>, I will <WG2309>; be you clean <WG2511>. And <WG2532> immediately <WG2112> his <WG846> leprosy <WG3014> was cleansed <WG2511>.

And <WG2532> Jesus <WG2424> says <WG3004> unto him <WG846>, See <WG3708> you tell <WG2036> no man <WG3367>; but <WG235> go your way <WG5217>, show <WG1166> yourself <WG4572> to the priest <WG2409>, and <WG2532> offer <WG4374> the gift <WG1435> that <WG3739> Moses <WG3475> commanded <WG4367>, for <WG1519> a testimony <WG3142> unto them <WG846>.
And <WG1161> when <WG1525> Jesus <WG2424> was entered <WG1525> into <WG1519> Capernaum <WG2584>, there came <WG4334> unto him <WG846> a centurion <WG1543>, begging <WG3870> him <WG846>,
And <WG2532> saying <WG3004>, Lord <WG2962>, my <WG3450> servant <WG3816> crouches <WG906> at <WG1722> home <WG3614> sick of the paralysis <WG3885>, grievously <WG1171> tormented <WG928>.
And <WG2532> Jesus <WG2424> says <WG3004> unto him <WG846>, I <WG1473> will come and <WG2064> heal <WG2323> him <WG846>.

The centurion <WG1543> answered <WG611> and <WG2532> said <WG5346>, Lord <WG2962>, I am <WG1510> not <WG3756> worthy <WG2425> that <WG2443> you should come <WG1525> under <WG5259> my <WG3450> roof <WG4721>: but <WG235> speak <WG2036> the word <WG3056> only <WG3440>, and <WG2532> my <WG3450> servant <WG3816> shall be healed <WG2390>.

For <WG1063> I <WG1473> am <WG1510> a man <WG444> under <WG5259> authority <WG1849>, having <WG2192> soldiers <WG4757> under <WG5259> me <WG1683>: and <WG2532> I say <WG3004> to this <WG5129> man <WG4198>, Go, and <WG2532> he goes <WG4198>; and <WG2532> to another <WG243>, Come <WG2064>, and <WG2532> he comes <WG2064>; and <WG2532> to <WG1401> my <WG3450> servant <WG1401>, Do <WG4160> this <WG5124>, and <WG2532> he does it <WG4160>.

When <WG1161> Jesus <WG2424> heard <WG191> it <WG2296>, he marveled, and <WG2532> said <WG2036> to them that followed <WG190>, truly <WG281> I say <WG3004> unto you <WG5213>, I have <WG2147> not <WG3761> found <WG2147> so great <WG5118> faith <WG4102>, no <WG3761>, not in <WG1722> Israel <WG2474>.

And <WG1161> I say <WG3004> unto you <WG5213>, That <WG3754> many <WG4183> shall come <WG2240> from <WG575> the east <WG395> and <WG2532> west <WG1424>, and <WG2532> shall sit down <WG347> with <WG3326> Abraham <WG11>, and <WG2532> Isaac <WG2464>, and <WG2532> Jacob <WG2384>, in <WG1722> the kingdom <WG932> of heaven <WG3772>.

But <WG1161> the sons <WG5207> of the kingdom <WG932> shall be cast out <WG1544> into <WG1519> outer <WG1857> darkness <WG4655>: there <WG1563> shall be <WG2071> weeping <WG2805> and <WG2532> gnashing <WG1030> of teeth <WG3599>.

And <WG2532> Jesus <WG2424> said <WG2036> unto the centurion <WG1543>, Go your way <WG5217>; and <WG2532> as <WG5613> you have believed <WG4100>, so be it done <WG1096> unto you <WG4671>. And <WG2532> his <WG846> servant <WG3816> was healed <WG2390> in <WG1722> the <WG5610> same <WG1565> hour <WG5610>.

And <WG2532> when <WG2064> Jesus <WG2424> was come <WG2064> into <WG1519> Peter <WG4074>'s house <WG3614>, he saw <WG1492> his <WG846> wife <WG3994>'s mother laid <WG906>, and <WG2532> sick of a fever <WG4445>.

And <WG2532> he touched <WG680> her <WG846> hand <WG5495>, and <WG2532> the fever <WG4446> left <WG863> her <WG846>: and <WG2532> she arose <WG1453>, and <WG2532> ministered <WG1247> unto them <WG846>.

When <WG1161> the evening <WG3798> was come <WG1096>, they brought <WG4374> unto him <WG846> many <WG4183> that were possessed with demons <WG1139>: and <WG2532> he cast out <WG1544> the spirits <WG4151> with <WG3056> his word <WG3056>, and <WG2532> healed <WG2323> all <WG3956> that were <WG2192> sick <WG2560>:

That <WG3704> it might be fulfilled <WG4137> which was spoken <WG4483> by <WG1223> Isaiah <WG2268> the prophet <WG4396>, saying <WG3004>, Himself <WG846> took <WG2983> our <WG2257> infirmities <WG769>, and <WG2532> bore <WG941> our sicknesses <WG3554>.

Now <WG1161> when <WG1492> Jesus <WG2424> saw <WG1492> great <WG4183> multitudes <WG3793> about <WG4012> him <WG846>, he gave commandment <WG2753> to depart <WG565> unto <WG1519> the other side <WG4008>.
And <WG2532> a certain <WG1520> scribe <WG1122> came <WG4334>, and said <WG2036> unto him <WG846>, Master <WG1320>, I will follow <WG190> you <WG4671> wherever <WG3699> <WG99999> you go <WG565>.

And <WG2532> Jesus <WG2424> says <WG3004> unto him <WG846>, The foxes <WG258> have <WG2192> holes <WG5454>, and <WG2532> the birds <WG4071> of the air <WG3772> have nests <WG2682>; but <WG1161> the Son <WG5207> of man <WG444> has <WG2192> not <WG3756> where <WG4226> to lay <WG2827> his head <WG2776>.

And <WG1161> another <WG2087> of <WG3101> his <WG846> disciples <WG3101> said <WG2036> unto him <WG846>, Lord <WG2962>, allow <WG2010> me <WG3427> first <WG4412> to go <WG565> and <WG2532> bury <WG2290> my <WG3450> father <WG3962>.
But <WG1161> Jesus <WG2424> said <WG2036> unto him <WG846>, Follow <WG190> me <WG3427>; and <WG2532> let <WG863> the dead <WG3498> bury <WG2290> their <WG1438> dead <WG3498>.
And <WG2532> when <WG1684> he <WG846> was entered <WG1684> into <WG1519> a boat <WG4143>, his <WG846> disciples <WG3101> followed <WG190> him <WG846>.

And <WG2532>, behold <WG2400>, there arose <WG1096> a great <WG3173> storm <WG4578> in <WG1722> the sea <WG2281>, so much that <WG5620> the boat <WG4143> was covered <WG2572> with <WG5259> the waves <WG2949>: but <WG1161> he <WG846> was asleep <WG2518>.
And <WG2532> his <WG846> disciples <WG3101> came to <WG4334> him <WG1453>, and awoke him <WG846>, saying <WG3004>, Lord <WG2962>, save <WG4982> us <WG2248>: we perish <WG622>.

And <WG2532> he says <WG3004> unto them <WG846>, Why <WG5101> are you <WG2075> fearful <WG1169>, O you of little faith <WG3640>? Then <WG5119> he arose <WG1453>, and rebuked <WG2008> the winds <WG417> and <WG2532> the sea <WG2281>; and <WG2532> there was <WG1096> a great <WG3173> calm <WG1055>.

But <WG1161> the men <WG444> marveled <WG2296>, saying <WG3004>, What manner of man <WG4217> is <WG2076> this <WG3778>, that <WG3754> even <WG2532> the winds <WG417> and <WG2532> the sea <WG2281> obey <WG5219> him <WG846>!

And <WG2532> when <WG2064> he <WG846> was come <WG2064> to <WG1519> the other side <WG4008> into <WG1519> the country <WG5561> of the Gergesenes <WG1086>, there met <WG5221> him <WG846> two <WG1417> possessed with demons <WG1139>, coming out <WG1831> of <WG1537> the tombs <WG3419>, exceedingly <WG3029> fierce <WG5467>, so that <WG5620> no <WG3361> man <WG5100> might <WG2480> pass <WG3928> by <WG1223> that <WG1565> way <WG3598>.

And <WG2532>, behold <WG2400>, they cried out <WG2896>, saying <WG3004>, What <WG5101> have we <WG2254> to do <WG2532> with you <WG4671>, Jesus <WG2424>, you Son <WG5207> of God <WG2316>? are you come <WG2064> here <WG5602> to torment <WG928> us <WG2248> before <WG4253> the time <WG2540>?
And <WG1161> there was <WG2258> a good way off <WG3112> from <WG575> them <WG846> an herd <WG34> of many <WG4183> pigs <WG5519> feeding <WG1006>.

So <WG1161> the demons <WG1142> begged <WG3870> him <WG846>, saying <WG3004>, If <WG1487> you cast <WG1544> us <WG2248> out <WG1544>, allow <WG2010> us <WG2254> to go away <WG565> into <WG1519> the herd <WG34> of pigs <WG5519>.

And <WG1161> when they were come out <WG1831>, they went <WG565> into <WG1519> the herd <WG34> of pigs <WG5519>: and <WG2532>, behold <WG2400>, the whole <WG3956> herd <WG34> of pigs <WG5519> ran violently <WG3729> down <WG2596> a steep place <WG2911> into <WG1519> the sea <WG2281>, and <WG2532> perished <WG599> in <WG1722> the waters <WG5204>.

And <WG1161> they that kept them <WG1006> fled <WG5343>, and <WG2532> went their ways <WG565> into <WG1519> the city <WG4172>, and told <WG518> every thing <WG3956>, and <WG2532> what was happened <WG3588> to the possessed of the demons <WG1139>.
